{{Lang|'''Xianyun'''|zh=闲云|zh_rm=Xiányún}}, also known by her adeptus name '''Cloud Retainer''', is a playable {{Anemo}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

Curious about what draws her disciples to [[Liyue Harbor]],<ref name="Lovely Dreams"/> she has taken up residence in the city to see for herself.
